metadata.description: Sample attention weights from cross-modal fusion

cross_modal_attention.description: Attention weights showing how each modality attends to others
cross_modal_attention.interpretation: Traces and metrics have strong mutual attention (0.56, 0.51), logs provide complementary information

service_attention_heatmap.description: Attention scores for top-10 suspected services

temporal_attention.description: Attention across time windows (last 15 minutes before failure)
temporal_attention.interpretation: Peak attention at t-3m (when fault symptoms become prominent)
